label: Practice gratitude
reason: Practicing gratitude and appreciating the good aspects of life positively impacts your mental wellbeing.

label: Spend time in nature
reason: Spending time outdoors boosts moods and reduces stress, pain, and anger.

label: Be kind
reason: Lending a helping hand scientifically increases positivity and lengthens lifespan

label: Connect with others
reason: Social interaction boosts confidence and self-esteem, as well as fights stress, depression, and anxiety.

label: Promote Positivity
reason: Thinking optimistically broadens perspectives and strengthens your mental health, even during difficult times.

label: Physical Activity
reason: Physical exercise reduces risk of disease, increases lifespan, and improves mental health.

label: Yoga
reason: Yoga calms the mind and improves mood.

label: Set Goals
reason: Setting goals induces feelings of accomplishment, pride, and happiness.

label: Practice Mindfulness
reason: Mindfulness improves emotional health and wellbeing.

label: Declutter your space
reason: Decluttering promotes a soothing and calm environment.

label: Sleep
reason: Sleep is essential and positively impacts physical and mental health.

label: Use ‘I’ statements to deal with conflicts
reason: Using ‘I’ statements may  contribute to effective conflict resolution

label: Practice Stress Reduction techniques
reason: Practicing relaxation techniques is a stress-reducing strategy that produces a greater sense of wellbeing

label: Yoga
reason: Yoga reduces stress, and increases strength and flexibility.

label: Physical Activity & Fitness
reason: Aerobics improves health, protects against disease, and boosts moods.

label: Stretching
reason: Stretching improves cardiovascular health, balance and flexibility.

label: Going to the Gym
reason: Fitness improves physical wellbeing and overall mental health.

label: Walking through campus
reason: Walking strengthens muscles and bones, improves physical energy and mood.

label: Hiking
reason: Hiking can help keep your thinking and learning skills sharp and help with better sleep.

label: Cardio
reason: Cardio improves fitness and helps to improve sleep, in turn reducing stress anxiety.

label: Sports
reason: Sports calm your mind, strengthen your muscles, and improve your overall well-being.

label: Get outside
reason: Getting outside relaxes and refreshes us, enhancing positivity

label: Short Workout
reason: Short workouts are just as effective as a full gym session for your body and mind

label: Eating Whole Foods
reason: Eating whole foods provides adequate nutrients and helps maintain healthy weight.

label: Drinking water
reason: Drinking water serves as the body’s solvent, flushes toxins and excess nutrients.

label: Eating fruit and vegetables
reason: Eating fruits and vegetables increase feeling of fullness and promotes healing

label: Pay attention as you eat
reason: Eating under stress may affect  what you eat and digestion.

label: Eating a variety of foods
reason: Diversifying foods boosts mood and immune system.

label: Including good fats into your diet
reason: Good fats improves the immune system and lowers risk of disease.

label: Make eating a positive experience
reason: Mindful eating reduces overeating and increases your awareness while eating.

label: Combine healthy eating with exercise
reason: Diet alone is not as effective in achieving a healthy body weight.

label: Eat Probiotic-rich foods
reason: Probiotic-rich foods such as yogurt may help with social anxiety.

label: Eat Oatmeal for Breakfast
reason: Oatmeal for breakfast can be a great choice to lift your mood.
